The website WhiteHouseGiftShop: com is selling coronavirus commemorative coins.
WhiteHouseGiftShop: com is not the official gift shop of the White House, and these commemorative coins were not officially sanctioned by the United States government.
The owner of WhiteHouseGiftShop: com confirmed that the White House is not selling coronavirus coins and that the White House Gift Shop is not affiliated with The White House.
The White House Gift Shop is a controver: and its ownership has been transferred to a private individual.
